website_summaries.verdict: A solid piece of equipment that provides a good resolution at a good price.
pros: A good tool for finding hot spots or air leaks in your home
Well-made and designed to withstand rough use
Battery lasts a decent amount of time
cons: Hard to tell the actual temperatures of surfaces with this model

customer_reviews.title: $400 for a disposable thermal imaging camera? I recommend staying away.
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in this product. Have had for 7 months and it no longer turns on or takes a charge. I used to pinpoint heat loss in my business and home. Total time using was less than 1 hour. Very expensive for being only able to use for that amount of time. Will not purchase again or recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Austin R

customer_reviews.title: Two stars Does not hold a charge when powered off
customer_reviews.text: The device has great quality imagery and detection range. However the one serious draw back I have with this device is that it does not hold a charge when the device is turned off. After a couple days, you will need to place a charge on it or leave it plugged in when not in use. Otherwise, use a flash light.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Thermal imaging helpful for beekeeper cutouts or checking on winter clusters
customer_reviews.text: I am a beekeeper, and sometimes I get calls to remove bees from buildings (cutouts). A recent call was for a 3 story house, with the bees somewhere in the roof line, exact location unable to determine. From the ground (about 20 ft), I was able to locate the swarm of bees in the roof line and save a lot of time and effort. I am very satisfied with this model. Not inexpensive (about $250 at time of purchase), it is functional and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Shadwins

customer_reviews.title: Seriously ridiculously great images at this price point
customer_reviews.text: I use it for home inspections and I can't say anything bad about this imager at this price. Didn't think I would care too much about the built-in flashlight, but it has proved itself very useful. If you're on the fence and deciding between this and a Flir with 320 x 240 resolution ($2000), DEFINITELY save the $1400 extra bucks and get this one! Crazy good resolution for the $ and is by far good enough for home inspections. Super portable also, which is a huge plus when having to carry multiple instruments around all day.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I have used several similar products and this one is the best value for the money. It has a very good sensor and is easy to see what you're looking at and compare surface temperature by moving the sensor slightly to position the crosshairs on a spot. I was able to "show" a customer how a damaged door gasket was allowing cold air to escape and dropping surface temperature of cabinet to 56F when door temperature about 6 inches away was 76F. Very handy and small with an option to capture screenshots. I am very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: DavidRinLincoln

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic for the price!
customer_reviews.text: This thermal unit has surpassed all my expectations in the first week of ownership. To be honest, for the price, wasn't expecting much. I had another unit at one time I paid five times as much for a couple of years ago. This unit is better! The battery lasts for a long period of time with the image quality much better than the more expensive unit. GREAT BUY!
customer_reviews.author: Big Ken

customer_reviews.title: Once you own this, you'll find a ton of uses for it.
customer_reviews.text: I had intended to purchase a different name brand, but was pleasantly surprised to find this. Works well for finding water damage, insulation deficiency, clogs in plumbing, electric boxes and even studs in exterior walls. I have used this to check the seals on appliances and drafts in windows/ door frames. Device is so sensitive that it even registered the temperature difference in a sprained ankle, although I'm pretty sure that is not it's intended purpose!
customer_reviews.author: Adrienne B.

customer_reviews.title: Worthless
customer_reviews.text: After a few pictures (about four or five), the SD card gets corrupted. You lose the pictures and have to undergo the hassle of reformatting the card, retake a few pics and back to square one. Tried three different cards all ended up the same way, which brings up another point that the spot is badly positioned that makes the SD card is tough to insert and remove. Battery life was horrendous although it can be recharged, which is more time wasted on this crap. Body appeared rugged as advertised, and the it images seemed accurate, but all that is secondary if the firmware is useless and you lose all the pics.
customer_reviews.author: Amzon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good value. Easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Very good IR imaging at reasonable price. Achieved peace of mind while checking 5 breaker boxes, heat losses at building foundation and doors. Found enough places where repairs or insulation is failing to pay for this cool tool over time. Tool is sensitive. I was able to see heat from my hand after touching a table top for less than 1/2 second. Impressive!
customer_reviews.author: Geobo

customer_reviews.title: Seek Reveal Pro Review
customer_reviews.text: Seek Reveal Pro Review The great price and picture quality out way the lack of features. Very little lag. It’s Unbeatable for wildlife and longer range detecting. Lots of filters. Picture button. SoMe other features to fine tune the picture. You need to connect the unit to a computer via USB to get the pictures off the unit.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Neff

customer_reviews.title: HIgh resolution with very long runtime
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice thermal camera that is able to produce high resolution thermal images. Compared to Seek thermal shotpro, this is clearer and much easier to use. It thermal calibration is also less annoying compared to Shotpro and has a nice LED light with independent switch that is very useful in the dark. Runtime is amazing and so far I am still on my first charge even though I have used it on several outdoor occasions.
customer_reviews.author: WY

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The flashlight was a nice feature. The buttons and overall feel were very nice. The image quality was poor. I could determine hot and cold areas, but the image was so poor it was like a blob of red and blue colors. I returned the item and plan to look into purchasing another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Ron P.

customer_reviews.title: Gives the big picture of thermal situations. Robust and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: A good piece of equipment. Well-made and handier than an add-on and an app. I use it for engine room inspections on a large powerboat. In the past I have used a single-point IR thermometer, but going to this gives me a better picture of what's going on. The only complaint I have is that some of the on-screen text is a bit small for my tired eyes...
customer_reviews.author: Techdad

customer_reviews.title: How the cold is getting into my home.
customer_reviews.text: The Seek Reveal Thermoimager works well for the home owner, contractor, home buyer, and a home inspector. It shows where insulation may be lacking and may need reinforcing. I purchased it as a home owner, looking to find where I had cold spots coming into my home. It gives you a thermo-image of the area you are viewing. It can basically give you an xray of the walls, where insulation is and is not. You can actually see the 2 x 4's in the wall. It is a very good product and a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Wisconsin Plowboy

customer_reviews.title: Saving on heating bill.
customer_reviews.text: Found air leaks in house, lowered heating bill, will pay for itself in two winters. Watched deer at night eating prime landscaping - took pictures for the game warden.
customer_reviews.author: Troy B Wallace

customer_reviews.title: the device is pretty solid for a <$400 device
customer_reviews.text: My Reveal arrived with a broken microSD reader. The devices will read the card, but only if I hold it in because the locking mechanism in the slot is broken. Seek told me to return it through Amazon to fix the issue. I didn't really have plans on saving the pictures anyway, so I won't be returning it since, for me at least, it's more of a moot issue. Other than the SD issue, the device is pretty solid for a <$400 device.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Nahas

customer_reviews.title: Nice camera, works perfect.
customer_reviews.text: My Seek thermal reveal pro works perfect. My impression is that the battery life is less than the information given by Seek. But that's always the case with electronics that you buy and works on batteries. It still works long enough, for about 80 - 120 minutes and that's long enough. For the rest it works perfect. Put your finger somewhere for one second and the camera picks up the heat difference which is less than one degree centigrade.
customer_reviews.author: m. roha

customer_reviews.title: Great For My House and Camping Trips
customer_reviews.text: A major upgtade from my phone attachment. Great for around the house as usual and with great resolution. I enjoy the added security and awareness while camping. No issues and highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Luke

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use, and rapidly charging. However, it is annoying that there is no option to manually set the temperature range of the color scale. Instead it is automatically calibrated constantly, which can be useful for revealing subtle effects but annoying when doing comparisons.
customer_reviews.author: Ian Burns

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use and to update the software
customer_reviews.text: I am a commercial roofing and insulation products sales rep and was anxious to get this tool to use when doing roof scans and checking for insulation problems. Very easy to use and to update the software. Certainly not a $5,000 professional tool but absolutely worth every penny of the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Mcquaid

customer_reviews.title: This thing is awesome.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome. I've used it to check circuit breakers, components on circuit boards, and heating in animal enclosures. It's much easier to use than a regular infrared thermometer because you can actually see the hot spots and aim the measurement at the hot spot, instead of just hoping you're pointing the infrared thermometer at the hot spot.
customer_reviews.author: Kal

customer_reviews.title: The best bang for the buck
customer_reviews.text: This is the least amount of money you could pay for a basic, yet effective, visual thermometer. I tried another, cheaper, version but it lacked the speed and resolution - this has a balance of cost and effectiveness and it built well - everything I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Roni A. Matzkin

customer_reviews.title: Might be smaller than what you think it will be.
customer_reviews.text: Unit and screen were smaller than I expected and hard to view, so it did not work well for my application. I am returning it. Unit itself seemed to function properly, which is why I am giving it a 3 star instead of a 2.
customer_reviews.author: Simone J. Werkmeister

customer_reviews.title: Works great, will help with heat bill!
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Helped me spot a bunch of spots in my house where the insulation wasn’t quite right. You can also use it as a stud finder on exterior walls in a pinch, it’s able to pick out the temperature difference.
customer_reviews.author: Chris P Bacon

customer_reviews.title: Gooed for home or small contractor work
customer_reviews.text: The unit was very low resolution for my needs. But it did work as advertised and would make a good home or small contractor tool for finding hot spots.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Great extra tool to have.
customer_reviews.text: If you want to check for water leaks in a wall or look for heat loss locations, and do not want to spend a lot of money, this small hand held reader works very well.
customer_reviews.author: John H.

customer_reviews.title: This unit has a decent sized sensor and a good display. Both of those seemed important drawbacks on ...
customer_reviews.text: This unit has a decent sized sensor and a good display. Both of those seemed important drawbacks on the competing units that rely on smart phone for those functions. I also like the battery life. Easy to take images and share them. I had anticipated that holding the unit horizontally and looking down vertically would be a problem, but that proved not to be the case during actually use. I'm learning things about heat loss and gain (important depending on the season) in my house. And let's face it, all your friends want to see their thermal hand print... ;) jfh
customer_reviews.author: John Hurdle

customer_reviews.title: works as described
customer_reviews.text: it does have a learning curve, but once you play with it everything falls in place. you can find a lot of useful info on youtube. before buying one pay attention to the functional details of each model, it will matter.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good value for the price
customer_reviews.text: for the price, packs high end specifications. some things could be better in terms of graphics and such, but again, very high resolution for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Birnbaum

customer_reviews.title: can show up traks on snow for up to 1/2 hr amazing
customer_reviews.text: just fine can pick a deer up at 100 yards in 40 deg temps helped me find 2 so far can see fresh tracks in snow cover for up to 1/2 hr amazing
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Does a good job but awkward to use. Would be much better in a point and shoot configuration.
customer_reviews.author: Frank J. Oslick

customer_reviews.title: Cool toy for a cool guy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera as a birthday present for my husband and he LOVES it! We are currently remodeling our house and he has been able to pint point problematic areas, which is very useful!!!! Plus, all his friends think he is a cool guy with a cool toy :-). Camera produces great imaging at a very affordable price! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: FitChick

customer_reviews.title: Awesome price for a thermal camera.
customer_reviews.text: I give it 4 stars only because the screen orientation is not conducive to viewing wildlife or inspecting tight areas.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Good

customer_reviews.title: my bad, utube video's fooled me
customer_reviews.text: 1st, i thought it shot video, it doesn't, my bad, utube video's fooled me, so that's on me. i give three stars, because no video, image focus was less than acceptable, images were too small. the good parts, it's solid, easy to hold, easy to understand and use. the flashlight is perfect, battery life and recharge time is great. however, i prefer a removable battery. so if battery goes bad, i can replace it.
customer_reviews.author: ed weaver

customer_reviews.title: Better IR sensor and battery life.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product that delivers a great image. It's not like the other manufacture that transposes a picture image over there thermal image, I found to be poor quality. Seek is using a much better thermal sensor that delivers a better thermal image. Battery life has been really good and would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So good I bought one for my nephew the Police Officer. He has already used it successfully
customer_reviews.author: Curmudgeon

customer_reviews.title: works excellent, not only because is the best price in ...
customer_reviews.text: Surprising device, works excellent, not only because is the best price in the market for an infrared camera. The filters are very useful because different situations deserves different filters, turns on fast, sturdy, battery lasts; the only problem with mine is that the temperature measurement is bias 3 °C below, but it's consistent so I make the sum, that's why I don't put the five stars.
customer_reviews.author: Mario Adaime

customer_reviews.title: Not bad at all.
customer_reviews.text: I got mine used off amazon for $250. I've used thermal cameras for over 20 years, most were Flir's and one was a Fluke. They ranged in price from $30,000 to $5000. A camera like this 5 years ago would have cost thousands of dollars. I think the range that Seek advertises is overblown however, 150' is the absolute maximum for identifying objects. Having said that I had no trouble negotiating my property in complete darkness. Combining the long battery life and a usable flashlight makes this an indispensable addition to any outdoor adventure.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not the same feature set as the smarthpone version
customer_reviews.text: Great build quality, I wouldn't be scared of throwing in the tool box. Unfortunately compared to the smartphone version this one lacks some features: No high-low temperature points, the only measurement point is the the center of the screen. No video feature, pictures only. Taking a picture takes about 2 seconds, it's not an instant process by any means. Slow in general. You can see how it draws the menus when you open one and when switching between items. But all in all this thing is worth every penny, I just wanted to give heads up for those that dealt with the smartphone version and were looking to get this one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Careful
customer_reviews.text: I’m not sure if I received a refund but the device just had a White screen. Was not able to get help!!
customer_reviews.author: Greg Brockwell

customer_reviews.title: Great unit for initial thermal inspection.
customer_reviews.text: Great unit for initial checks. Easily shows heat loss/gain from studs in walls and heat transfer at ceiling penetrations.
customer_reviews.author: John P

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: For the money its good but to be honest if I had more money I would have upgraded.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: great item
customer_reviews.text: Was very happy with this product. Got this for my boyfriend for Christmas. He has done lots of research on thermal cameras and has learned a lot about them. He did not have one in particular he wanted so when I started looking at them, I jumped in "blind". Could not afford anything fancy so with no knowledge other than description, this is the one I chose. Awesome! I did good and he absolutely loves it and said the features are great and it works great!!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Good at what is good at.
customer_reviews.text: Things on screen looks a lot smaller than you would expect. Videos reviews of product deceptive. But good for home defense and been using at my electronic job to fine hot chips on boards. It''s actually found lots of problems fast that would have taking time to find even though it's not really designed for that.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Very Useful
customer_reviews.text: It does not have really high resolution, but it doesn't claim to. And unless you are a professional thermographer this is more than enough for almost anyone. I have found leaks, issues, animals, and you name it with this. It is relatively rugged and works well.
customer_reviews.author: Ian Robertson

customer_reviews.title: Don`t drop it
customer_reviews.text: It worked great until it slip out of my hand and hit the floor and fell apart at the flashlight and camera side. It only fell a few feet. I would have thought it would be a little more durable.
customer_reviews.author: M Perry

customer_reviews.title: works pretty well for most applications.
customer_reviews.text: The camera needs a slightly larger thermal difference to show color changes than i would like but for the price point i am happy overall.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin B.

customer_reviews.title: The amazing thermal display device with low price budget.
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing product if you interested in thermal problem whenever you have encounter daily. The overall workmanship of this product is excellent. My applications are use to find out heat loss in my house so I can improve it. Also I use it on all of my cars to find out hot spots and sometimes on my electronic circuit boards. One caution this device would not give you extremely accurate temperature measurement but surely give you reasonable accurate thermal picture as long as you aware the limitation of the device. For the price it is probably the best bang for your buck. Good product and I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: WORKS-----Way far away!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing, great improvement on original seek for phone!
customer_reviews.author: Jude

customer_reviews.title: Great device
customer_reviews.text: It's a great tool to have especially for the price battery is great. Flashlight is bright I use mine for firefighting and couldnt be any more happier with its its durable and willing to take anything thrown it's way
customer_reviews.author: allows you to shar

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Works good and i don’t have to use my phone
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: It appears someone at Amazon may have taken this out to play with it.
customer_reviews.text: I received this item and the box seal was broken. I opened it and found that the camera had been dropped. Damage on the corners etc. it look like someone was playing around with it. The direction had food on them upon further investigation the outside box had what appeared to be grease.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Can't beat the resolution for the price. Just wish there was software to go with it.
customer_reviews.author: Tweak

customer_reviews.title: All that it said it was but no more
customer_reviews.text: This really does what it says it will. If you're looking for something more grandiose then you are going to pay more. I use this in the woods just to get some bearings on what's around and it works great for that.
customer_reviews.author: Trent Meadows

customer_reviews.title: I bought this in December it worked and then the ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in December it worked and then the thermal emaging just quit working. Can not get any resloution on the screen. It will change the filter and go into settings and can read text
customer_reviews.author: w

customer_reviews.title: Support?
customer_reviews.text: The product is working fine. No usable manual comes with the device. (You must download the manual) Seek only answers emails once a week. Do not expect the phone to be answered by a person. They will respond within a week by email. I still do NOT know if i have registered the product. The product registration page does not allow data to be entered. Based on how registration is being handled, I don't expect quality customer support..
customer_reviews.author: PtLGrnl

customer_reviews.title: Impressive!
customer_reviews.text: Very impressive. Use it for fire fighting and hunting at night. Not much range up to 500ft but there is better models for more money. Cheapest at this time and see coils in freezer and animals in yard and also see studs in wall.
customer_reviews.author: james

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This works perfect, we use it on honey bee hives to view the cluster.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: toy
customer_reviews.text: Fun to have. The picture is 321X306 pix not much details, but you will see something regular camera does not show.
customer_reviews.author: L. Su

customer_reviews.title: Great tool for the price
customer_reviews.text: It works great just got it today,for the price I was surprised of the quality of it .i would recommend it.rob
customer_reviews.author: Rvm

customer_reviews.title: portable, great for the toolbag.
customer_reviews.text: I can see the beams in the ceiling through the plaster. awesome
customer_reviews.author: dMT

customer_reviews.title: A great machine
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for everything from tracking blood trails to Refrigeration and Heating
customer_reviews.author: Danny foster

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat it for the price
customer_reviews.text: You can't beat it for the money. Great way to find where your home is letting heat out and cold in. It's also super fun to look at animals at night though if you're using it for hunting I'd get the XR FastFrame version as it has more distance.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Flanick

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money that it costs.
customer_reviews.text: Does not pick up the thermal images as good as I hoped.
customer_reviews.author: Bret

customer_reviews.title: Very useful and not too pricey.
customer_reviews.text: It does very well, the pixels are jumpy but overall a worth while product.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Poole

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great tool. I use it as a diagnostic tool to check horses legs and feet.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Vacek

customer_reviews.title: Thank You Amazon for the best price in the US
customer_reviews.text: This is a must for any home owner that wants to cut down on his or her heating/cooling bill. Thank You Amazon for the best price in the US.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Affordable tool
customer_reviews.text: Love this tool. I use it in fire service. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Robert f.

customer_reviews.title: Great for jobs in multifamily building
customer_reviews.text: Great for jobs in multifamily building. Found major leak with it. Easy to use
customer_reviews.author: Lemmy

customer_reviews.title: a great device
customer_reviews.text: this device provides great qualitative images. Ten years ago , a device that could do this would have cost over $10k
customer_reviews.author: jack schmid

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: This product is a cost efficient thermal imaging camera. It's portable, has long battery life (11-12 hours) and is interesting to use. My primary complaint with the device is that it does not have variable focus as the units that plug in to cellphones have.
customer_reviews.author: cm

customer_reviews.title: seek reveal
customer_reviews.text: it does work but as image is not sharply defined, there is some ambiguity in what you are viewing
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: no charging hours on instructions
customer_reviews.text: i just got my handsome seek reveal dead have to charge it it don't say how long to charge it or when to find out when its fully charged. it would've been better if the instructions weren't written in white on a grey background, very hard to read. all in its a great heavy camera will submite photos as soon as its charged.
customer_reviews.author: ronald james ferreira

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: My only complaint is that the color is not consistent, it is relative to the current screen,, but not the same across all scales. does work very well
customer_reviews.author: NVShootist

customer_reviews.title: Work well
customer_reviews.text: Short and simple review works well for the price and I would not hesitate to purchase another if needed.
customer_reviews.author: JMH

customer_reviews.title: ... this as a up close tool it will work fine but at a long distance there a lot to ...
customer_reviews.text: It is ok but not very clear if your thinking of this as a up close tool it will work fine but at a long distance there a lot to improvement needed . at the price its ok but a little to high for what you get.
customer_reviews.author: michael Hammac

customer_reviews.title: Super fast delivery!
customer_reviews.text: Lightning fast Sunday delivery. Well packaged. Product box seals fully intact. Works as described and as per reviews. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very revealing for the price. Just need to learn how to interpret the different shades.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: nice easy to use thermal imager. price is great too.
customer_reviews.author: Bearwood Sam

customer_reviews.title: ... what it is supposed to thermal images very well great product, havent had a chance to use on ...
customer_reviews.text: Does exactly what it is supposed to thermal images very well great product ,havent had a chance to use on any thing yet , but ive played with it & it works very well !
customer_reviews.author: mike livermore

customer_reviews.title: I have been very pleased with the it
customer_reviews.text: Seek Reveal worth buying for personal use. I have been very pleased with the it. I an ex appraiser and broker.
customer_reviews.author: Adeeb B. Eramya

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Does well what I expected it to do. And the price is very appealing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed in myself I have not used it more
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in myself I have not used it more. Seek Reveal is a legit thermal imager, with the ability to take photos, and has many other features to use on it. I use it for house maintenance issues and for hobbies. Images and photos taken 100 to 200 feet away have no definition, but it does show the heat signature. Great buy, no regret!
customer_reviews.author: Carla Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Works great! Pinpoints heat gain/loss with a great display
customer_reviews.text: A lot of technology for $400. Works great! Pinpoints heat gain/loss with a great display!
customer_reviews.author: Steve C.

customer_reviews.title: great for the money i think ... nice standalone unit
customer_reviews.text: great for the price so far ... i got an 'accessory close up lens' for it which is great for electronics work ... though I cannot for the life of me seem to mount the thing on my imac to transfer images - which is very disappointing!!!! addendum: also discovering that it's been giving me false readings which is odd ... measuring about 80F/28C off the screen but BURNT my hand touching the object being observed - what gives???
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Ok So I am hoping this is as cool as it looks but have not tried it yet ...
customer_reviews.text: Ok So I am hoping this is as cool as it looks but have not tried it yet because believe it or not it is a Christmas gift
customer_reviews.author: Erin L Phillips

customer_reviews.title: This was a mistake.
customer_reviews.text: When I received the piece the attachment to cover the USB was broken. Instructions were poor.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Merritt

customer_reviews.title: Recommended but pricy
customer_reviews.text: Really a great device to check for home leaks. Mine has a problem so I will be returning it. but it is really nice. Recommended but I am sure the price will come down.
customer_reviews.author: A Long-time Prime Person

product_meta.title: Seek Thermal Reveal – Ruggedized, All-Purpose Thermal Imaging Camera , Blue - RW-AAA
product_meta.description: Style:RevealDesigned for the realities of life in the field, the Seek Reveal combines an advanced thermal imaging camera with a high performance LED light in one compact, rugged, and reliable device. Built for the realities of work and play, the Seek Reveal handheld thermal imager combines powerful thermal insight and a high-performance light in one durable device. With a detectable range of -40 to 626 F, Reveal lets you pinpoint specific sources of heat-and heat loss-up to 500 feet away, all at just the touch of a button. Whether you're a plumber searching for a clog, an electrician checking for a hotspot, a hunter tracking game, or a homeowner looking for peace of mind, Reveal delivers the insight and illumination you need to find, fix, and feel safe faster.
feature_bullets: Ruggedized, all-purpose thermal camera with a 206 x 156 thermal sensor for use at home, the jobsite, and beyond.
Find and fix faster by seeing problems invisible to the naked eye such as: energy loss, electrical and mechanical failures, water damage, and hundreds more heat related issues.
Perfect tool for DIY homeowners, contractors, and engineers.
Includes a 300 lumen LED flashlight, rechargeable battery that lasts up to 10 hours, large color display, and durable rubberized casing.Thermal Sensitivity < 70 mK
SPECS: 206 x 156 Thermal Sensor, 36° Field of View, < 9 Hz Frame Rate, Fixed-focus Lens, -40F° to 626°F Detection Range, Captures Photos, Spot Temperature, 7 Color Palettes, Auto Mode

specifications.Included Components: MicroSD Card & USB Cable, Welcome Guide, Seek Reveal, Wrist Lanyard
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars294 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
